content:
As we are using the IG Publisher, I will put instructions here:
https://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/IHE_FHIR_Profile_Publication

This uses one of the existing templates. Next I will
1. Provide instructions on how IHE editors can use this to publish conformance resources for existing profiles
2. Provide some status and requirements / next steps
3. Work on the toolset to facilitate #1 above
